name: Nostalgiarian
description:
Nostalgiarian is an old school platform game which you can jump, climb, run, fight... Improve your reflexes, hunt. It is short game to casual gamers.
In Nostalgiarian you will remember your childhood.

  • 15 different stages!
  • Platform game, climb, run, jump, fight, hidden traps!
  • It is for casual gamers.
  • Short game which you can fun.
